item.title: Casillera del Diablo Carménerè
item.description: Pretty great value at $12 a bottle. I would stock up on this as it would age pretty well for at least a while, and it would be great to have on hand to go with a nice and simple grilled steak. Tasting Notes Dark ruby in color Intitial aroma of black cherry, black berry, currant Some dried cherry, vanilla spice, and leather Medium body Medium-minus acidity Medium-minus tannin on the back of the tongue Some eucalyptus and resin on the palate Medium finish
